text:
This occurs while running Lenya on Jetty.

Accessing
  http://localhost:8080/lenya/docs-new/index.html
leads to this error:

org.apache.cocoon.ProcessingException: Unable to get transformer handler for 
skins/lenya-site/xslt/html/tab2menu.xsl: 
org.apache.excalibur.xml.xslt.XSLTProcessorException: Exception in creating 
Transform Handler

java.io.FileNotFoundException:
G:\jetty\Jetty-4.2.9\skins\lenya-site\xslt\html\tab2menu.xsl

The file exists here:
G:\jetty\Jetty-4.2.9\webapps\lenya\lenya\pubs\docs-new\skins\lenya-
site\xslt\html\tab2menu.xsl
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de

text:
is this still the case? seems that either jetty or forrest are mixing up some
global variables and concatenate the path incorrectly
creator: gregor@apache.org
